duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide medication assistance and support to Special Needs Adults in a residential care home setting.
Perform overnight cleaning, bed checks, and security checks of the facility.
Assist with training on medication assistance and licensing requirements for the residential care home.
Complete training and certification requirements including TB testing, orientation, safety, food handling, CPR, first aid, mental health, and dementia training.
Participate in Federal background check, drug test, and fingerprint screening.
Adhere to healthcare regulations and standards.
Maintain a clean and safe environment for residents.
Assist with resident well-being and special care needs.
Participate in weekly and daily pay operations.
Report to appropriate management and respond to residents' needs effectively.

education_certification.credential: Certified Nurse's Aide (CNA) license or Home Health Aide (HHA) license
